Accountant.description: Reference to the accountant of the customer. Conditions: The referred accountant must have value > 0 in the field IsAccountant

ActivitySector.description: Reference to Activity sector of the account

ActivitySubSector.description: Reference to Activity sub-sector of the account

AutomaticProcessProposedEntry.description: Automatically create entries for complete entry proposals

Blocked.description: Indicates if the account is blocked

BSN.description: Citizen Service Number for the Netherlands

BusinessType.description: Reference to the business type of the account

CanDropShip.description: Indicates the default for the possibility to drop ship when an item is linked to a supplier

Code.description: Unique key, fixed length numeric string with leading spaces, length 18. IMPORTANT: When you use OData $filter on this field you have to make sure the filter parameter contains the leading spaces

CodeAtSupplier.description: Code under which your own company is known at the account

CompanySize.description: Reference to Company size of the account

ConsolidationScenario.description: Consolidation scenario (Time & Billing). Values: 0 = No consolidation, 1 = Item, 2 = Item + Project, 3 = Item + Employee, 4 = Item + Employee + Project, 5 = Project + WBS + Item, 6 = Project + WBS + Item + Employee. Item means in this case including Unit and Price, these also have to be the same to consolidate

ControlledDate.description: Date of the latest control of account data with external web service

CreditLinePurchase.description: Maximum amount of credit for Purchase. If no value has been defined, there is no credit limit

CreditLineSales.description: Maximum amount of credit for sales. If no value has been defined, there is no credit limit

CustomField.description: Custom field endpoint. Provided only for the Exact Online Premium users.

DatevCreditorCode.description: DATEV creditor code for Germany legislation

DatevDebtorCode.description: DATEV debtor code for Germany legislation

DeliveryAdvice.description: Allows a customer to do goods delivery based on setting complete, partial or partial no back order. Values:  0 = Partial,  1 = Complete,  2 = PartialNoBackOrder

DiscountPurchase.description: Default discount percentage for purchase. This is stored as a fraction. ie 5.5% is stored as .055

DiscountSales.description: Default discount percentage for sales. This is stored as a fraction. ie 5.5% is stored as .055

EnableSalesPaymentLink.description: Indicates whether payment link is activated for sales

EndDate.description: Determines in combination with the start date if the account is active. If the current date is > end date the account is inactive

GLAccountPurchase.description: Default (corporate) GL offset account for purchase (cost)

GLAccountSales.description: Default (corporate) GL offset account for sales (revenue)

GLAP.description: Default GL account for Accounts Payable

GLAR.description: Default GL account for Accounts Receivable

GlnNumber.description: Global Location Number can be used by companies to identify their locations, giving them complete flexibility to identify any type or level of location required

HasWithholdingTaxSales.description: Indicates whether a customer has withholding tax on sales

IgnoreDatevWarningMessage.description: Suppressed warning message when there is duplication on the DATEV code

IncotermVersionPurchase.description: Version of Incoterm for Purchase  Supported version for Incoterms : 2010, 2020

IncotermVersionSales.description: Version of Incoterm for Sales  Supported version for Incoterms : 2010, 2020

InvoiceAccount.description: ID of account to be invoiced instead of this account

InvoiceAttachmentType.description: Indicates which attachment types should be sent when a sales invoice is printed. Only values in related table with Invoice=1 are allowed

InvoicingMethod.description: Method of sending for sales invoices. Values: 1: Paper, 2: EMail, 4: Mailbox (electronic exchange), 8: Send and track

IsAccountant.description: Indicates whether the account is an accountant. Values: 0 = No accountant, 1 = True, but accountant doesn't want his name to be published in the list of accountants, 2 = True, and accountant is published in the list of accountants

IsAgency.description: Indicates whether the accounti is an agency

IsAnonymised.description: Indicates whtether the account is anonymised.

IsCompetitor.description: Indicates whether the account is a competitor

IsExtraDuty.description: Indicates whether a customer is eligible for extra duty

IsMailing.description: Indicates if the account is excluded from mailing marketing information

IsPilot.description: Indicates whether the account is a pilot account

IsReseller.description: Indicates whether the account is a reseller

IsSales.description: Indicates whether the account is allowed for sales

IsSupplier.description: Indicates whether the account is a supplier

LeadPurpose.description: Reference to Lead purpose of an account

LeadSource.description: Reference to Lead source of an account

LogoFileName.description: The file name (without path, but with extension) of the image

PayAsYouEarn.description: Indicates the loan repayment plan for UK legislation

PaymentConditionPurchase.description: Code of default payment condition for purchase

PaymentConditionSales.description: Code of default payment condition for sales

PriceList.description: Default sales price list for account

PurchaseLeadDays.description: Indicates number of days required to receive a purchase. Acts as a default

PurchaseVATCode.description: Default VAT code used for purchase entries

RecepientOfCommissions.description: Define the relation that should be taken in the official document of the rewarding fiscal fiches Belcotax

Reseller.description: ID of the reseller account. Conditions: the target account must have the property IsReseller turned on

SalesCurrency.description: Currency of Sales used for Time & Billing

SalesVATCode.description: Default VAT code for a sales entry

SeparateInvPerSubscription.description: Indicates how invoices are generated from subscriptions. 0 = subscriptions belonging to the same customer are combined in a single invoice. 1 = each subscription results in one invoice. In both cases, each individual subscription line results in one invoice line

ShippingLeadDays.description: Indicates the number of days it takes to send goods to the customer. Acts as a default

ShowRemarkForSales.description: Indicates whether to display Ordered by account's remarks when creating a new sales order

StartDate.description: Indicates in combination with the end date if the account is active

State.description: State/Province/County code When changing the Country and the State is filled, the State must be assigned with a valid value from the selected country or set to empty

Status.description: If the status field is filled this means the account is a customer. The value indicates the customer status. Possible values: A=None, S=Suspect, P=Prospect, C=Customer

TradeName.description: Trade name can be registered and shown with the client (for all legislations)

Type.description: Account type: Values: A = Relation, D = Division

UniqueTaxpayerReference.description: Unique taxpayer reference for UK legislation

VATLiability.description: Indicates the VAT status of an account to be able to identify the relation that should be selected in the VAT debtor listing in Belgium

VATNumber.description: The number under which the account is known at the Value Added Tax collection agency
